com.rigado.rigablue

Class RigLeBaseDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rigado.rigablue.RigLeBaseDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRigCoreBluetoothDeviceObserver

    public class RigLeBaseDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRigCoreBluetoothDeviceObserver
    This class provides and object representation of a Bluetooth device with all of its available services and characteristics.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RigLeBaseDevice

        public RigLeBaseDevice(java.lang.String deviceName,
                       android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice bluetoothDevice,
                       java.util.List<android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattService> serviceList,
                       byte[] scanRecord)
        Creates a new base device object.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - The local name of the device parsed from the advertising data scanRecord or set using BluetoothDevice.getName(). See RigAvailableDeviceData.parseNameFromScanRecord(byte[], BluetoothDevice)
        bluetoothDevice - The Bluetooth device for this base device
        serviceList - The list of services available for the Bluetooth device
        scanRecord - The advertising data for this device

      • RigLeBaseDevice

        Parameters:

        serviceList - The list of services available for the Bluetooth device
        scanRecord - The advertising data for this device

      • setDiscoveryComplete

        public void setDiscoveryComplete()
        This function can be used to bypass full device discovery if not needed.

      • runDiscovery

        public void runDiscovery()
        This function starts the full discovery process. This process will discovery all characteristics of all services and issue read requests for all characteristics which have the read property.

      • didUpdateNotificationState

        public void didUpdateNotificationState(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice btDevice,
                                       android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        This callback is received from the low level Bluetooth API when the state of a characteristic notification has been successfully updated.
        Specified by:
        didUpdateNotificationState in interface IRigCoreBluetoothDeviceObserver
        Parameters:
        btDevice - The device for which the characteristic state changed
        characteristic - The characteristic which changed notification state

      • didUpdateValue

        public void didUpdateValue(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice btDevice,
                           android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        This callback is received from the low level Bluetooth API when the value of a characteristic has changed. This happens either due to an asynchronous notification or due to a read request.
        Specified by:
        didUpdateValue in interface IRigCoreBluetoothDeviceObserver
        Parameters:
        btDevice - The device for which the characteristic value changed
        characteristic - The characteristic which had a value change

      • didWriteValue

        public void didWriteValue(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice btDevice,
                          android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        This callback is received anytime a write to a characteristic has completed. This will be called even if a write is performed using WriteWithoutResponse.
        Specified by:
        didWriteValue in interface IRigCoreBluetoothDeviceObserver
        Parameters:
        btDevice - The device for which the characteristic value write finished
        characteristic - The characteristic which had its value written

      • didReadDescriptor

        public void didReadDescriptor(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice btDevice,
                              android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattDescriptor descriptor)
        This callback is received from the low level Bluetooth API due to a read request on a BluetoothGattDescriptor.
        Specified by:
        didReadDescriptor in interface IRigCoreBluetoothDeviceObserver
        Parameters:
        btDevice - The device for which the descriptor read was requested
        descriptor - The descriptor which was read
